identity.name: Oasis Credit
identity.visual_metaphor: The Oasis: A source of life in a dry landscape. Fluid, refreshing, reliable.

rules: Use Inter for all body text, inputs, and dense data.
Never use Inter for H1 or H2.

primary.description: Deep Teal - The water of the oasis. Trust, depth.

usage_rules: Primary (Teal) is for Brand Identity and Primary Buttons.
Secondary (Green) is for Success states and 'Apply Now' accents.
Accent (Gold) is for 'Special Offers' or 'High Value' highlights.
Backgrounds should be mostly white/off-white. Use Teal only for specific high-impact sections (Hero, Footer).

rules: Use generous spacing. Minimum p-8 for cards.
Section gaps should be at least py-24 to allow breathing room.
Use 'Bento' grids for feature lists (asymmetric spans).
Cards should have rounded-3xl corners to mimic organic shapes.

textures: Use subtle noise overlay on solid Teal backgrounds to prevent flatness.
Use 'water ripple' abstract shapes (SVG) as background patterns in Hero.

rules: No 'transition: all'. Animate specific properties (transform, opacity, colors).

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-semibold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-semibold
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-semibold

cards.product: bg-white rounded-3xl p-8 border border-border/50 shadow-card hover:border-primary/20 transition-all group relative overflow-hidden
cards.feature: bg-muted/30 rounded-2xl p-6 border border-transparent hover:bg-white hover:border-border/50 transition-all

hero_bg.alt: Modern curved architecture representing Oasis growth
hero_bg.usage: Hero section background or side visual

assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Stroke width 1.5px for elegance.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'manrope' font via Google Fonts or Fontsource.
2. THEME: Update tailwind.config.js with the HSL values provided in 'colors'.
3. LAYOUT: Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the home page features section.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components (Button, Card, Input) to match the 'rounded-full' and 'rounded-3xl' styles.
5. CALCULATOR: Build the Loan Calculator with a smooth slider (use Shadcn Slider) and real-time updates.
6. FORMS: Use 'react-hook-form' + 'zod' for the multi-step application.
7. LOCALIZATION: Prepare the structure for i18n (RU default).
8. ANTI-AI: Do not use generic gradients. Use the provided images and whitespace to create a premium feel.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
